law.text: The last surviving parent of a minor may by will nominate a guardian, or alternatively a limited guardian, or conservator, or both, for the minor. One (1) person or entity may be nominated to manage the minor's financial resources and another to have care, custody, and control of the minor.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 487, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2016.
